SEARCH
Package projectone

Class HumanStrategy

java.lang.Object
projectone.HumanStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerStrategy
public class HumanStrategy extends Object implements PlayerStrategy
Strategy implementation for a human-controlled player. Prompts input via console to select cards and wild colors.

    • chooseCard

      public Card chooseCard(UnoGame gameController, Hand hand, List<Card> playableCards, Card topPileCard, Color activeWildColor)
      Description copied from interface: PlayerStrategy
      Chooses a card to play based on game state and hand.
      Specified by:
      chooseCard in interface PlayerStrategy
      Parameters:
      gameController - Provides context including top pile card and current wild color.
      hand - The player's hand.
      playableCards - Cards filtered by hand as valid to play.
      topPileCard - The card currently on top of the discard pile.
      activeWildColor - The currently selected wild color.
      Returns:
      Chosen card or null to pass.
